name: Yellow Rubber Duck
info: This is a yellow toy duck it is rubber and squishable. It is selling for $2.99 you may only call the function demo_squishing_duck

name: Adidas Shoe
info: This is a premium adidas blue shoe, it costs $59.95 and can be worn in any weather. It is guaranteed to make you run faster or your money back! There are an infinite amount of different variants you can see by invoking show_next_variant there is also a patented super comfy insole that should be highlighted that can be shown to the user by invoking look_at_insole

name: Vintage Velvet Love Seat
info: This is a vintage velvet love seat, it costs $499, be sure to talk about the ergonomic support the chair offers making it a great chair for any living room.

name: Antique Camera
info: This is an antique camera from the 1800s. It costs $299. The tripod base is made of reclaimed oak wood. The camera itself has 3 focus lenses and a shutter time of 5 seconds.
